page.title: 18EDENBRIDGE LEISURE CENTRE
page.content: The Edenbridge Leisure Centre was opened in 1984 and was granted by the Sports Council. The facilities for sport are as follows:_ 4 squash courts, a fully_equipped weight training room, and a hall that can cater for a variety of sports from badminton to archery. Upstairs is a relaxation area for both adults and children. Already a number of non_ sporting events have been held in the hall, for example, roller discos, dances, public meetings and BMX(stunt bikes) competitions. To use the facilities one must be a member or be accompanied by a member. Annual membership charges are :_Adult Â£6; Family Â£12; under 18 Â£4. For people living outside the town the costs are increased by 25%. A member still pays hire charges on top of this to use the various facilities...by Richard Weaver
